LanguageData.CorruptWhispersInterventionText: A decision needs to be made on how to deal with the whispers
LanguageData.EmpireImplantsText: {0} claims that Chaos is stronger than ever, and is trying to influence settlements.\n\n They also say they can protect from the corruption with implants, and will gladly take aspiring nobles to fight the corruption.
LanguageData.ImplantsRecievedText: {0} say that you can visit their settlements to get more implants installed at any time.
LanguageData.VisitImplants: Implant to all caravan members (takes .25 days)
LanguageData.RoyaltyRequired: Side with the Empire (disabled: Royalty only)
LanguageData.CorruptionEmbracedText: Your colony has chosen to embrace the corruption
